title: Were there two black guys in Oklahoma without media attention?
subtitle: Some have called the killing and cutting off of two African-American men because of the sale of arms that went wrong "modern justice."
author: David Emery
vclaim: Two black men, Alise Ramon Smith and Jaron Kinte Morland of Moore, Oklahoma, were executed by four white people in April 2018, a crime largely ignored by the media.
